title: Residential solar PV : U.S. market value 2016
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Market value in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Market value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Market value in billion U.S. dollars, about 4.7 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.7 was reported at Year 2012
